name: Latent
headline: Medical language models to automate healthcare operations
description:
At Latent, we're building medical language models to tackle the trillions of operational overhead weighing down healthcare. Our flagship product streamlines authorizations for life-saving drugs by analyzing EHR records and surfacing the most relevant data.

We've built our product and signed enterprise contracts with some of the largest health systems in the US.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:b2b; industry:healthcare; industry:insurance; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Sri Somasundaram, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Latent. At Stanford, Sri investigated molecular binding patterns responsible for adaptive immunity and built deep RL robots with publications at ICML, ICLR, and Nature. He also operationalized language models for the largest financial institutions while on the founding team of Hebbia.

# Generative AI for Healthcare Operations
Medical LLMs built to scale Pharmacy Operations
[Watch a Demo](https://latenthealth.com/<./#demo>)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FiMssP5jvOYEdy2CkYAThuU69E.png)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Y2sjQjGvu6kaqMh3QeE0dfctj0.png?scale-down-to=2048)


  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FiMssP5jvOYEdy2CkYAThuU69E.png)
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Y2sjQjGvu6kaqMh3QeE0dfctj0.png?scale-down-to=2048)


## Our Core Technology
Latent indexes the entire EHR and surfaces perfectly-cited evidence from patient charts using generative AI.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x1RTxyyCP8kCc4bFweNJN0TzE94.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x1RTxyyCP8kCc4bFweNJN0TzE94.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x1RTxyyCP8kCc4bFweNJN0TzE94.png)
Search for any patient data
##### Prior Authorization for Specialty Pharmacy & Infusions
Latent Search enables rapid scaling of Pharmacy Operations by increasing efficiency by 6x while improving accuracy and ensuring compliance.
[Learn more](https://latenthealth.com/<./contact>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vUx1ma1sVRJWoRLQUJbSUUsCqw.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vUx1ma1sVRJWoRLQUJbSUUsCqw.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vUx1ma1sVRJWoRLQUJbSUUsCqw.png)
##### Secure and Native EHRIntegrations
Latent integrates using SMART on FHIR with Epic, Oracle Health, and any EHR natively. Latent meets established industry certifications (HIPAA, SOC 2), and we strive to exceed these best practices to ultimately protect customer data.
[Learn more](https://latenthealth.com/<https:/security.latenthealth.com>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x1RTxyyCP8kCc4bFweNJN0TzE94.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x1RTxyyCP8kCc4bFweNJN0TzE94.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x1RTxyyCP8kCc4bFweNJN0TzE94.png)
Physicians, clinicians
Radiology reports
Laboratory data
Hospitals
Vital signs
Insurers
##### Intelligent 340B Qualification
AI assisted search to document complex care scenarios and customized compliance criteria to optimize 340B qualification opportunities, saving millions of dollars in annual drug spend.
[Learn more](https://latenthealth.com/<./contact>)
## Transforming Industry Standards

## **Latent** Empowering Healthcare
Latent helps hospitals and clinics do their paperwork so patients can get their life-saving meds faster.
Latent harnesses generative AI to up-skill and optimize your Pharmacy and give you back time to break down the barriers to getting your patients on therapy.
Latent envisions AI as the backbone of healthcare workflows, aiming to be the trusted bridge that seamlessly connects patient data to improve access, affordability, and adherence for patients.
[![sri](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6607pBpHIJx1Msft9KStmSNHfo.webp)![sri](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6607pBpHIJx1Msft9KStmSNHfo.webp)![sri](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6607pBpHIJx1Msft9KStmSNHfo.webp)](https://latenthealth.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/ssomasundaram/>)
##### Sriram Somasundaram
Co-Founder
Sri is a Stanford bio/AI researcher turned founder. He has published cutting-edge research in top conferences and journals like ICML, ICLR, and Nature. He was also on the founding team of Hebbia, where he operationalized LLMs for the largest financial institutions in the world.
[![rish](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kolh78l2Xmyia1I4muaTQLsM.webp)![rish](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kolh78l2Xmyia1I4muaTQLsM.webp)![rish](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kolh78l2Xmyia1I4muaTQLsM.webp)](https://latenthealth.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/rj254/>)
##### Rishabh Jain
Co-Founder
Rish Jain is a serial entrepreneur. He started his career with building the #1 music app on the app store. He has also led engineering at various startups and more recently, co-founded and sold his last startup.
## Be Part of the Change
If you are a builder who is passionate about making a difference in healthcare / passionate about working in the intersection of AI and healthcare, we would love to talk to you! 
[Contact us](https://latenthealth.com/<./hiring>)
© 2024 Latent. All rights reserved.
[Security Report](https://latenthealth.com/<https:/security.latenthealth.com/>)

generated_description:
### Latent: Revolutionizing Healthcare Operations with AI

**Overview**
Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, Latent is on a mission to automate healthcare operations using advanced medical language models. Part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, Latent is tackling the enormous operational inefficiencies in healthcare—specifically the burdensome paperwork and approvals that delay access to critical medications.

**What They Do**
Latent’s flagship product focuses on streamlining the authorization process for life-saving drugs. By analyzing Electronic Health Records (EHRs), it extracts and surfaces relevant patient data, significantly reducing the time and effort required for authorizations. This tool increases efficiency by up to 6x while ensuring compliance and improving accuracy in pharmacy operations. 

**Technology and Integration**
Leveraging generative AI, Latent indexes entire EHRs and provides easily-cited evidences from patient records. Their technology offers secure and seamless integration with industry-standard systems like Epic and Oracle Health, adhering to necessary certifications such as HIPAA and SOC 2, ensuring the protection of sensitive customer data.

**Team and Leadership**
The small but dedicated team of 12 is led by co-founders Sriram Somasundaram, an AI researcher from Stanford, and Rishabh Jain, a seasoned entrepreneur. Together, they bring a wealth of expertise and a shared vision to break down barriers in healthcare access and affordability.

**Why It Matters**
In an industry overwhelmed with paperwork and regulatory hurdles, Latent is carving a path forward where technology does the heavy lifting. Their solution not only accelerates patient access to necessary therapies but also propels healthcare providers towards a more efficient operational model.

**Future Aspirations**
With a clear focus on the intersection of AI and healthcare, Latent envisions itself as the backbone of healthcare workflows, striving to enhance patient care and operational excellence. If you’re passionate about building innovative solutions in this space, they’re eager to connect with like-minded individuals.

**Get Involved**
For those interested in contributing to this transformative journey in healthcare technology, Latent welcomes builders to join them in making a genuine difference. 

For more information, visit [Latent Health](https://latenthealth.com).
